descript.abstract:
The Historical Transit Facilities layer contains streetcar, ferry and horsecar facilities dating back to about 1872. One shape and one corresponding record exists for each route segment.
The point work was derived referencing the Functional Class Roads dataset from the Metropolitan Council.
Attributes include facility name, type of facility, year opened and year closed.
descript.purpose: To identify all locations in the Twin Cities metropolitan area where horsecar, ferry and streetcar facilities existed.
descript.supplinf: Historical extent of streetcar routes in the Twin Cities metropolitan area.

timeperd.current: Routing information is accurate to reflect knowledge of transit history and referencing the book Isaacs A. & Diers J.W. 2007. Twin City Lines. The Streetcar Era in Minneapolis and St. Paul. University of Minnesota Press.

theme.themekey: historical, historical transit facilities,streetcar, horsecar, steampower, ferry, transit, buses, routes, streets, roads, transportation

place.placekey: Twin Cities, Anoka County, Carver County, Dakota County, Hennepin County, Ramsey County, Scott County, Washington County

citeinfo.title: Historical Transit Facilities, Transit Routes, Hi-Frequency Transit Service Network, transit segments, Transit

attracc.attraccr:
Routing information is accurate to reflect knowledge of transit history and referencing the book Isaacs A. & Diers J.W. 2007. Twin City Lines. The Streetcar Era in Minneapolis and St. Paul. University of Minnesota Press.
Attributes randomly checked by Metropolitan Council GIS staff.

dataqual.logic: This dataset contains one record and one point for each facility in the Twin Cities Metropolitan Region. Each facilities' point was created by referencing the Functional Class Road dataset provided by the Metropolitan Council.
dataqual.complete: Entire seven county area is covered.

horizpa.horizpar: Accurate to the Functional Class Roads dataset provided by the Metropolitan Council

vertacc.vertaccr: Accurate to the Functional Class Roads dataset provided by the Metropolitan Council.

procstep.procdesc: See the metadata for the Functional Class Roads dataset provided by the Metropolitan Council.

spdoinfo.mgmg3til: One layer for entire seven county region.

overview.eaover:
LINE ATTRIBUTES:
FAC_NAME: The name of the transit facility.
TYPE: The mode of transit the facility supported.
YR_START: The year the transit facility was constructed.
YR_END: The year the transit facility was closed.
